hints.content:
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/521b50edc261511c7552a2fef370f3c8388c050c.png)
Car: This is a **new** resource of traffic. Cars were invented in the late 19th century and are a common mode of modern transportation.
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/f7450c61cc95f2153371d1aa037662d0b8ee23d3.png)
Aeroplane: This is a **new** resource of traffic. Aeroplanes were invented in the early 20th century and have revolutionized long-distance travel.
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/a913626b683adec585fccf093bd61a5a1abac784.png)
Bullock-cart: This is an **old** resource of traffic. Bullock-carts have been used for transportation for thousands of years, long before the invention of motorized vehicles.
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/718012ec8ff927bb774b01169baa07cee22207e8.png)
Scooter: This is a **new** resource of traffic. Scooters, especially motorized ones, were invented in the 20th century and are a common mode of modern transportation.
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/675feb6ef7b220a6f1a8d5cb43f35e47e82bd851.png)
Cycle: This can be considered an **old** resource of traffic. Bicycles were invented in the 19th century, and while they are more modern compared to bullock-carts or sailing boats, they predate the invention of motorized vehicles like cars and aeroplanes, making them an older form of transportation.
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-content-images/da87ab684fee15baea28ae9c38b15d88f8382709.png)
Sailing Boat: This is an **old** resource of traffic. Sailing boats have been used for transportation for thousands of years, long before the invention of motorized vehicles.
